author: undetermined
full_text:
I apologize, but the provided HTML appears to be a collection page listing multiple articles, not a specific fact-check article. The content seems to be a preview page of PesaCheck's recent fact-checks, showing headlines and brief summaries of various fact-checking articles.

To extract a specific fact-check article's content, I would need the HTML of the full article page itself. The current HTML contains multiple article previews and website navigation elements, but no complete fact-check report.

If you would like me to process a fact-check article, please provide the HTML of the specific article page you want analyzed.
title: To reach out to our teams, email hello@pesacheck.org or info@pesacheck.org
vclaim: To reach out to our teams, email hello@pesacheck.org or info@pesacheck.org
